attributes.action: To remove the present Health Secretary from Office
attributes.additional_details: We would like to see a Health Secretary that has knowledge that has experienced working in the NHS and someone that will safe guard our NHS and its Workers for generations to come. It was once the most respected Health services in the world
attributes.background: We the people of England and the uk. Feel that the present Health Secretary as of the 17th of October. 2022 isn't suitable for the postion because that they no knowledge of how an NHS uk  and socal care works.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
